name: Melee: The Battle Boardgame
overview: This board game by John Patrick Green is keyboard controlled. Each space on the board is lettered from A to X, starting left to right, top to bottom. Start off by placing your characters by typing the letter of the spot you want to start it on. If you wanted to start playing the game and if you wanted to move the character standing on the top left, to the right you would press A followed by B.
